comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: William DeWolf Hopper (1858-1935): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DeWolf_Hopper He married six times, but if this is 1915, it must be... Hedda Hopper? They married in 1913, divorced in 1922: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hedda_Hopper And that would make the child their only son William Hopper (1915-1970): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Hopper He would earn a Bronze Star during WWII, and become an actor.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The photographer, prominent New York portrait photographer Aram Kazanjian is best known today as the father of Arlene Francis (born Arline Francis Kazanjian), American actress and television personality.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for providing this information. We'll use some of it in the record the next time we update.
